CustomField.description: Holds the effective account for this Stored Payment. This field will be utilized in implementations where a user can order for multiple accounts inclusive or exclusive of their own. The effective account is used to control the entitlements, pricing, integrations etc that drive the site experience.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will be utilized in implementations where a user can order for multiple accounts inclusive or exclusive of their own. The effective account is used to control the entitlements, pricing, integrations etc that drive the site experience.
CustomField.label: Effective Account ID
